EmailTemplate.name: RSM: Comm of MA - Prospecting Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Savings: Commonwealth of MA Fleet Fuel Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS has negotiated special terms with WEX and Gulf Oil to offer your organization a fleet fueling program with exclusive fuel rebates* and cost-saving benefits – designed to give you complete control over your business fleet:
REBATES:
• Monthly fuel rebates based on the Commonwealth’s fuel spend
• 3¢ off per gallon when you fuel at Mass Pike and Cumberland Farms locations
• 2¢ off per gallon when you fuel at any other Gulf-branded location
BENEFITS:
• Online tools that allow you to set driver spending limits, receive purchase alerts, and see what your drivers are buying, where, when & for how much
• Detailed reporting, including vehicle performance data
• Tax exemption for qualified fleets
• An “early pay” rebate
• Access to over 90% of U.S. fueling locations, including over 2,500 Gulf stations
• No set-up or monthly card fees
• Easy, online account management and bill payment
• Award-winning 24/7 customer service
• And more…
I’d like to review the Commonwealth program with you in a brief meeting or phone call. I’ll connect with you this week to set up a date and time. Feel free to contact me by email or phone if you’d like to talk sooner.
Thank you,
Toni Clemens Regional Sales Manager – New England and New York Gulf Fleet Card Program ▪ WEX Inc. Hartford, CT Office/Cell: (203) 233-0349 Fax: (207) 791-1618 Email: toni.clemens@wexinc.com
*Rebates will appear as a credit on monthly invoice.
